name: Enok's Kingdom Ridge
journal_text: Old survey channels identify this ridge as the first place Enok declared a united frontier. The wind still carries coded pings from buried beacons.

name: Makuna's Shore
journal_text: Makuna's tidal lab once refined moon dust into stable forms. Shoreline scanners still detect dormant fabrication grids beneath the sand.

name: Greegion Ruins
journal_text: A sealed Greegion mining cathedral. Dream Keepers avoid it, and local handlers report Shadow King glyphs flickering on inactive terminals.
